newsitem.title: CHILE: Enersis pays $36.4 mln for water co stake.
newsitem.headline: Enersis pays $36.4 mln for water co stake.

text.p: Chilean power investment company Enersis has paid $36.4 million for a 55 percent stake in water utility Empresa de Agua Potable Lo Castillo, a source at Enersis told Reuters
Enersis plans to invest $80 million in Lo Castillo, which supplies water to Santiago, said the source, who declined to be named.
Lo Castillo has been criticized for bad management of its water resources. Water to homes has been cut recently due to a serious drought that has dried up local rivers.
